item.title: IPv6 PD
item.description: The Prefix Delegation options provide a mechanism for automated delegation of IPv6 prefixes using the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP).

item.title: TAP Device
item.description: In computer networking, TUN and TAP are kernel virtual network devices. Being network devices supported entirely in software, they differ from ordinary network devices which are backed by physical network adapters.

graph TD subgraph ISP Network ISP{{ISP Core Network}} --> AD["Aggregation Device<br>(Delegating Router)"] end AD -- DSL to subscriber premises --> CPE["CPE<br>(Requesting Router)"] subgraph Subscriber Network CPE --> PC1[Subscriber<br>PC] CPE --> PC2[Subscriber<br>PC] CPE --> PC3[Subscriber<br>PC] CPE --> PC4[Subscriber<br>PC] end
